text: @WhiteHouse @realDonaldTrump The lies from Trump are going with every sentence. Disputes what his own experts are saying. Lying about severity, treatment and everything else. Your cult followers may not care or more likely not understand, but the rest of us see the Wizard of Oz. #Covid19
